name: sawmill construction | sawmill | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/13743/documentation

The service life is assumed to be 50 years. Thus the life time output is 2'500'000 m3 sawn timber. This data must only be used to consider the infrastructure needed for sawing wood if this is not relevant.

The land area and the material and their transports needed for building and disposal of a sawmill with a yearly output of 50'000 m3 sawn timber is included. Land used for air drying of wood is not included.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data are derived by averaging rough estimates of a small sawmill in Switzerland and a large sawmill in Germany. Estimates are so rough that the Geograhpy is not relevant.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Sawmill with it's input wood storage place, a lop station, a hall with the saw and a conveyer belt.
